title: Moderate-speed city driving on a clear day.
caption: The ego vehicle drives straight on a city street, passing a parked truck and a pedestrian crossing the street.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (glareDay). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.4 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.
description: The road is a two-lane city street with parked cars on the side. The traffic is moderate, with other cars driving at a similar speed. The weather is clear, with no visible fog or rain. There are several traffic lights and stop signs along the road, all of which are visible and in the off position.
reasoning: The ego vehicle maintains a moderate speed because it is driving in a city environment where the speed limit is likely lower. It passes a parked truck and a pedestrian crossing the street, which requires the driver to be attentive and prepared to stop if necessary. The driver also keeps a safe distance from other vehicles on the road, which helps prevent accidents and maintain a smooth flow of traffic.
